# activityItemsConfigurationSupports(interaction:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the activity items configuration supports the specified type of interaction.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func activityItemsConfigurationSupports(interaction: UIActivityItemsConfigurationInteraction) -> Bool
```

## Managing Supported Interactions

- **UIActivityItemsConfigurationInteraction**: A structure that describes types of interactions.

items.description: A structure that describes types of interactions.
items.name: UIActivityItemsConfigurationInteraction
